subject: Fw: Thank you for your recent refinance application, we accepted your appication
body:
Your credit history does not matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this offer will expire TONIGHT):
$238,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this simplified form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://icvbmitecat.com/
